name: The Adventures of Eyevon
description:
The Adventures of Eyevon is about a hero whose journey begins when mysterious regions around the town have emerged. He travels to each region to unearth the secrets of life beyond, in order to quell the fears of the village that peace will not last forever...

An Action-Adventure game centered around Eyevon! Explore vast areas with unique environments and fully-orchestrated music. Level up to gain access to the ability to access new locations with a variety of enemies, items, and challenges!

Credits to:

- Maxwell Yang

- Diego Jiménez

- Fernando Ramos

- Andrew Bajek
